name: Exodus: The Last War
description: In a few days time the first and the biggest from the thousands of Toth planet remains will hit Bataar planet and it will turn Bataar into the burning tarch. The conveyors and war ships are caring Moroi technicians and the equipment. The bas ship is equipped with complicated devices necessary to open the superspace tunnel. Such a tunnel is vital to move fast and to reach the destination point. The Moroi expedition directs towards the second planet in Antares system. There is sitiated informal Zelds mine colony. The Moroi people exodus has startet.
